title: Remington Damage Protection Hair Dryer, Purple, D3190D

description.detailed:
• Damage Protection: Experience 3X more protection* with micro-conditioners and Advanced Coating Technology.
  • 3X More Protection*: The grill is infused with an Advanced Coating Technology that helps protect hair during styling.
  • Healthier Hair*: Our proprietary technology releases micro-conditioners through the styler?s airflow for less damage and healthier hair*.
  • 1875W Max Power: Dry hair fast with 1875 watts max power.
  • Ionic + Ceramic + Tourmaline Technology: The styler grill is coated with a trio of technologies to dry hair faster with less frizz*.
  • Concentrator & Diffuser Included: The concentrator is great for perfecting straight hairstyles and the diffuser helps enhance natural curls and waves.
  • Removable Air Filter: The removable air filter is easy to clean, and keeps the styler working at peak efficiency.
  • 3 Heat + 2 Speed Settings + Cool Shot: Find the heat and airflow you prefer for your hair type, then use the cool shot button to lock in your gorgeous style.
description.short:
• Damage Protection Hair Dryer for Shiny, Healthy Hair
  • 3X More Protection* with Advanced Coating Technology
  • Healthier Hair* with Proprietary Micro-Conditioner Technology
  • 1875W for Fast Drying Power
  • Ceramic + Ionic + Tourmaline Grill for Faster Drying with Less Frizz*
description.medium: Get great looking hair with this Remington Damage Control Ceramic Hair Dryer (available in purple). It features three heat settings, two speed settings and a cool shot, giving you flexible control of your results. The micro-conditioners help prevent heat damage and increase the shine of your hair. This ionic hair dryer also helps to heal previously damaged hair while reducing static and frizz. The ceramic technology prevents hair damage while allowing for a faster dry time. Powerful enough for thick and wavy hair, the diffuser enhances your natural curls and waves while the removable filter allows for easy cleaning to extend the motor life. The semiprecious gemstone technology works in conjunction with the ceramic technology, producing far-infrared energy, which protects the hair cuticle from over-heating, preventing brittleness and cracking. This Remington Damage Control Ceramic Hair Dryer is dependable and reliable and is made with high quality for long lasting use.

category.categoryPath: Home Page/Beauty/Hair Care/Hair Styling Tools/Hair Dryers/All Hair Dryers

title: Remington Pro Pearl Ceramic Hair Dryer with Soft Touch Finish, Pink/Black, AC2015E

description.detailed:
• Professional Pearl Ceramic - Infused with real crushed pearls, this advanced ceramic formula is emitted into the airflow during styling, giving you fast, luxurious, and professional results.
  • 1875W Salon Performance AC Motor - The professional quality AC motor delivers salon performance, with 1875W max power to dry hair fast.
  • 50% Faster* Dry Time - The powerful airflow activates the Pearl Ceramic to dry hair fast with a lustrous finish.
  • Luxurious Finish, Professional Results - Professional Pearl Ceramic combines with powerful airflow and constant heat performance to create faster* salon results.
  • The Ionic Generator - Achieve 90% less frizz** with the built-in ionic generator which transfers negative ions during styling, helping reduce frizz for smooth results.
  • Soft Touch Finish - The dryer exterior features a soft touch finish for easy handling.
description.short:
• Professional Pearl Ceramic for Less Damage and Fast, Salon Results*
  • 1875W Salon Performance AC Motor
  • Optimized Airflow for 50% Faster* Dry Time
  • Crushed Pearl Infused Grill for Smooth Results
  • Ionic Generator for 90% Less Frizz**
description.medium: Style your hair with the Remington AC2015 Hair Dryer for a smooth salon finish. The high-quality motor in the Remington professional dryer has ceramic pearl technology, which features nourishing micro-conditioners. When you use theRemington AC2015 Hair Dryer, these micro conditioners are activated by heated airflow and are immediately transferred to your hair and seal the cuticle to give your hair a lustrous finish. This highly efficient 1875 watt salon-quality dryer dries your hair 40% faster than normal household dryers. The generator in the Remington Ceramic Pearl Hair Dryer bathes you hair with positive ions to give you super soft and shiny hair. With two speeds and three radiant ceramic heat settings, the Remington professional dryer helps you create a variety of hair styles effortlessly. This salon quality dryer comes with various hair styling tools, including a concentrator and a diffuser. Get this amazing professional hair dryer and forget all about bad hair days.

description.medium: Treat yourself to fast and thorough drying after showers with the Conair 1875-Watt Dryer Model 247WB. This hair dryer features 1875 watts of power with two heat options and two speed settings so that you can have control and customize your blow drying experience. This mid-size black hair dryer is made with a concentrator nozzle for additional drying power and more directed air flow. It comes equipped with an ergonomic handle that fits comfortably in your hands. A cool shot is included and can be used to quickly cool hair after you heat style it, providing a more long-lasting style. This product weighs 1.2 pounds and plugs into the wall, with no batteries necessary. The chassis has black with white lettering and a blue cool shot button. The cord has a built in ring near the Conair dryer for easy hanging.

It folds to a compact size, so it's easy to pack in your suitcase or put away in a bathroom drawer.

description.medium: Diffuser for curly or textured hair. Promotes shiny, healthy looking hair & prevents heat damage.  How the ionic dryer works to keep hair shiny and healthy: Clouds of negatively-charged ions neutralize positive charges that are in the air and reduce the static electricity that causes fly-away frizzies and dulls hair. Hair becomes shinier and more manageable.  Conair, Ionic Turbo Styler, MODEL #146RX
